name: E-MAILiT
tag_list: bookmarking-and-sharing, website-content, widget, social-media, publishers, advertisers, end-users, campaigns, analytics, display-ad, marketing
overview:
We would like to introduce you Greece’s 1st and only sharing platform E-MAILiT.

E-MAILiT helps Publishers to increase engagement, turn their visitors into Sharers/Followers/Advertisers and generate income from sites’ social activity via integrated online advertising and in global basis, is the only social sharing tool which monetizes content. Creates at the same time of the visits, optimization of the social traffic and income, for the Publisher, through a mix of scalable and custom features. E-MAILiT, combines all the elements together and in one place, working as an extra non stop profit source for you.

Publishers and brands use our Share buttons (in Any custom Website and Blogger), browser extension (as a Bookmarklet, in any browser), analytics, media solutions, plugins and modules (Joomla and WordPress). E-MAILiT will be available soon on Android mobile devices too.

E-MAILiT’s mission is to constantly developing a simple and easy to use platform that can upgrade the way people share, follow and advertise online.
